rows.label: tlk42100121_04_msg0001
rows.name:
Takaka make another discovery of
century! Two in same decade!

rows.label: tlk42100121_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Takaka been watching Driver scout
carefully and finally notice something.

rows.label: tlk42100121_04_msg0003
rows.name:
When Blade resonate with Driver,
very rare chance to unlock
crazy-strong hidden power.

rows.label: tlk42100121_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Big possibility of unbelievable power!
Stronger than Holy Grail! Stronger than
Jewel of Superbia!

rows.label: tlk42100121_04_msg0005
rows.name:
And it even look like normal Blade
from distance. But from it Takaka
sense amazing potential!

rows.label: tlk42100121_04_msg0006
rows.name:
So Drivers not give up on dream,
and someday will meet best Blade,
with power beyond compare!
